entry.title: https://github.com/MarkusPfundstein/mcp-obsidian
entry.content: MCP server that interacts with Obsidian via the Obsidian rest API community plugin

entry.title: https://github.com/Shubhamsaboo/awesome-llm-apps
entry.content: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.

entry.title: https://github.com/TEN-framework/TEN-Agent
entry.content: TEN Agent is a conversational voice AI agent powered by TEN, integrating Deepseek, Gemini, OpenAI, RTC, and hardware like ESP32. It enables realtime AI capabilities like seeing, hearing, and speaking, and is fully compatible with platforms like Dify and Coze.

entry.title: https://github.com/amd/gaia
entry.content: Run LLM Agents on Ryzen AI PCs in Minutes

entry.title: https://github.com/getzep/graphiti
entry.content: Build Real-Time Knowledge Graphs for AI Agents

entry.title: https://github.com/hacksider/Deep-Live-Cam
entry.content: real time face swap and one-click video deepfake with only a single image

entry.title: https://github.com/home-assistant/core
entry.content: üè° Open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first.

entry.title: https://github.com/joanrod/star-vector
entry.content: StarVector is a foundation model for SVG generation that transforms vectorization into a code generation task. Using a vision-language modeling architecture, StarVector processes both visual and textual inputs to produce high-quality SVG code with remarkable precision.

entry.title: https://github.com/khoj-ai/khoj
entry.content: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

entry.title: https://github.com/letta-ai/letta
entry.content: Letta (formerly MemGPT) is the stateful agents framework with memory, reasoning, and context management.

entry.title: https://github.com/ocrmypdf/OCRmyPDF
entry.content: OCRmyPDF adds an OCR text layer to scanned PDF files, allowing them to be searched

entry.title: https://github.com/pydantic/pydantic-ai
entry.content: Agent Framework / shim to use Pydantic with LLMs
